New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single in the 11th inning, securing a 4-3 victory for the New York Yankees over the Kansas City Royals.
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr.'s walk-off RBI single in the bottom of the 11th inning was the decisive moment of the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees increased their AL East lead to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore with the win.
Post-Match Reflections: The Kansas City Royals fell 4 1/2 games behind first-place Cleveland in the AL Central but remain in contention for a wild card spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a series where the Yankees took two of three wins against the Royals.
